title: £250.00 pw-Studio in Bride Street, Islington, London, N7 Ref: 352
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Bride Street, Islington, London, N7
£250.00 Per Week
Ref: 352

Property Details
We are happy to offer this beautiful and bright studio apartment in Bride Street, Islington, N7

The property consists of:
* Beautifully presented studio flat
* Benefits from wood floors throughout, ensuite shower room with toilet, double bed and open plan kitchen
* Windows overlooking the communal garden
* The rent includes gas bills (hot water and heating)
* Bride Street is close to Arundel Square, within 500m of Highbury and Islington tube and overland, and the same distance from the bars, shops and restaurants of Upper Street
